review_text: Absolutely love this toothpaste! My teeth are noticeably whiter after just a week. Great taste too.
Good whitening effect, but the flavor is a bit too strong for me. Sensitivity is fine.
Best whitening paste on the market. I've tried them all. ShinyWhite is the real deal.
Made my teeth very sensitive. Validated the whitening claim, but at what cost?
Excellent results. My dentist asked what I was using.
It's okay. Tastes fresh but didn't see much whitening. Good for daily use though.
Decent toothpaste. Fresh breath lasts a long time. No sensitivity issues.
Terrible texture, feels gritty. Won't buy again.
Love the minty flavor! Leaves my mouth feeling super clean.
Good value for money. Does the job.
Love that it's natural ingredients. Tastes a bit earthy but I got used to it.
The tube broke after two uses. Product is okay but packaging needs work.
Finally a natural toothpaste that actually cleans! Highly recommend.
It's expensive for what it is. I prefer ShinyWhite for results.
Good eco-friendly option. Recyclable tube is a plus.
